text:
The salary of a full-time certified employee of a school district, private school, community college, or university shall be prorated over a 12-month period for the purpose of determining eligibility for assistance under this Article. 
(Added by Ord. 150-98, App. 5/8/98)

heading.catch_text: PRORATION OF SALARY OF FULL-TIME CERTIFIED EMPLOYEE OF SCHOOL DISTRICT, UNIVERSITIES, COMMUNITY COLLEGES OVER A TWELVE-MONTH PERIOD.
